## User Story
As a [user type], I want [an action] so that [benefit/value].

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Given [context], when [action], then [result]

## Technical Requirements
- Files to modify:
- API changes:
- Database changes:

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Code implemented and tested
- [ ] Unit tests written
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] Documentation updated
